title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-1.10 - Other allowances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-1.10 - Other allowances

State Regulations

No other allowances for any other items, services or
facilities furnished by the employer to an employee shall be permitted as part
of the minimum wage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
141-1.10

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
